card_name: Brotherhood of the Fire Fist - Cardinal
card_text: 2 Level 4 "Fire Fist" monsters$NYou can detach 2 materials from this card, then target 2 "Fire Fist" / "Fire Formation" cards in your GY and/or face-up field, and 2 cards in your opponent's GY and/or face-up field; shuffle those targets into the Deck. You can only use this effect of "Brotherhood of the Fire Fist - Cardinal" once per turn.
